title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using Photon, the popup menu for the Java editor ruler does not appear.
OB: When I right-click on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, no popup menu appears.
EB:
1) Open a Java editor in Photon.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected behavior: A popup menu should appear with options to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor in Photon.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
3) Verify that a popup menu does not appear.
